attributes.additional_details: I have been through bullying & abuse throughout my childhood life & my adulthood life. It’s affected me badly. Mental health etc. I don’t want young children experiencing this, I want social media to be positive.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to STOP BULLYING & abuse being used online. This can be for all sorts of reasons. Turn it into crime. People are losing their lives because of the abuse.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about bullying and harassment on social media, however it's not clear what specific actions you'd like the Government to take to address this problem.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Make it compulsory to submit ID on social media to help end online abuse':
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572480

'Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833
